properties.title: Lohnerhütte SAC
properties.description: Sure-footed cabin visitors unafraid of heights love the cosy cabin with its absolutely sensational view of Adelboden and its five valleys. The access from Bunderalp via Chrachli as well as the one via Leiternweg (ladder trail) are secured by chains. The cabin offers climbing tours on Lohner or the challenging alpine panorama trail via Witi Chume and Luser to Engstligenalp.
